original_text: And the king of the south shall be moved with choler, and shall come forth and fight with him, even with the king of the north: and he shall set forth a great multitude; but the multitude shall be given into his hand.
korean_text: 남방 왕은 크게 노하여 나와서 북방 왕과 싸울 것이라 북방 왕이 큰 무리를 일으킬 것이나 그 무리는 그의 손에 넘겨 준 바 되리라

sentences.original_text: The king of the south shall be moved with choler
and shall come forth and fight with him
even with the king of the north
and he shall set forth a great multitude
but the multitude shall be given into his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 무리가 그의 손에 넘겨질 것이라
